items.sentence: Tom ate my bacon, lettuce and tomato sandwich.
Tom became aware that Mary was staring at him.

Tom doesn\'t even try to keep up with fashion.
Tom doesn\'t get along with his mother-in-law.
I think we should concentrate on other things.

I thought that my father was going to kill me.
